mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE customer_id = (SELECT id FROM customer WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND is_activated = TRUE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (customer_id, is_activated) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM customer WHERE user_id = #{userId}), TRUE)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET is_activated = FALSE WHERE customer_id = (SELECT id FROM customer WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND is_activated = TRUE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_product (cart_id, product_id, count) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT cp.* FROM cart_product cp JOIN cart c ON cp.cart_id = c.cart_id JOIN customer cu ON c.customer_id = cu.id WHERE cu.user_id = #{userId} AND c.is_activated = TRUE
